translations: 鸦片；起麻木作用的事物，精神鸦片；麻醉剂

phrs.translation: n. [史]鸦片战争（1839-1842年中英间的战争）

sentences.sentence: Method: Xingnaojing combined with Naloxone was used IV. to rescue 45 cases of opiums poisoning, the effect of which was compared with that of 25 cases treated with Naloxone only.
sentences.translation: 方法：醒脑静联合纳洛酮静脉使用抢救阿片类中毒患者4 5例，并与单纯纳洛酮救治的2 5例对照。
